title: Is it really possible to MAIN fill in ranked?
body:
I have 1 really good champion for each role, but i always say "ad/mid -> fill" so people know my prefered roles.

That being said... would it be worth it to try to round out my play style? If I keep it to 5, would it work better than being a good ad/mid and an okay jungle top support?

Or should I try to improve all roles, not just my mid/adc abilities?
